cast.overview: Young and ambitious Captain Vivés has just been appointed group leader at the Grenoble Criminal Squad when Clara's murder case lands on his desk. Vivés and his team investigate Clara's complex life and relations, but what starts as a professional and methodical immersion into the victim's life soon turns into a haunting obsession.
cast.title: The Night of the 12th

details.biography: Anouk Grinberg, daughter of writer Michel Vinaver. First a theater actress, she has performed in both private and public theaters, under the direction, among others, of Jean-Louis Martinelli, Patrice Chéreau, Didier Bezace, Jacques Lassalle, Alain Françon. In cinema or for television, she has toured in particular with Bertrand Blier, Jacques Audiard, Gilles Bourdos, Nina Companeez. She also performs in public readings. For several years, she has also exhibited her drawings and paintings.
details.name: Anouk Grinberg
